summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Mineral Springs Way between Ashworth Avenue and Meridian Avenue; providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of said Mineral Springs Way between said limits; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said street; providing that the entire cost of such improvements shall be paid from the City Street Fund and repealing Ordinance No. 84733.
